pages.title: Waystones
pages.text: $(br)$(key)Waystones$() allow you to quickly teleport between different locations. You can find them in $(bold)villages$(), or craft them yourself.$(br2)You cannot use $(key)Waystones$() to enter or leave the $(mechanic/dungeon)dungeon dimension$() or the $(mechanic/ocean)Ocean of Consciousness$().

pages.title: Teleport Anytime
pages.text: $(br)$(key)Abyss Watcher$() and $(key)Pocket Wormhole$() let you $(bold)open the teleport screen from anywhere$(). The difference is that $(key)Abyss Watcher$() is $(bold)single-use$(), while $(key)Pocket Wormhole$() is $(bold)reusable$().
